UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Strategies for transformation of naturally-occurring amphibian antimicrobial peptides into therapeutically valuable anti-infective agents.
Literature.Author: Conlon JM, Al-Ghaferi N, Abraham B, Leprince J

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=64µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae KK3 9904(MIC=128µM),Enterobacter cloacae HNTCC 53001(MIC=128µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=64µM),Proteus mirabilis ATCC 25933(MIC=>128µM),Staphylococcus aureus NCTC 8352(MIC=4µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis RP62A(MIC=4µM),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=16µM),Streptococcus group B HNTCC 80130(MIC=16µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium LT2(MIC=64µM),Candida albicans ATCC 90028(MIC=16µM)
